title: Update unauthenticated sign-in welcome heading to “Welcome to EOA”

requirements.summary: Ensure unauthenticated sign-in prompt screens display the exact heading “Welcome to EOA” with no extra characters, without changing authentication behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user is signed out and lands on a page that renders the unauthenticated sign-in prompt, the screen shows the text "Welcome to EOA" clearly and exactly (no leading/trailing characters like "W").
The welcome text is user-facing English and is readable at common desktop and mobile widths.
No changes are made to authentication behavior (login/logout) other than updating the displayed welcome copy.

file_operations.description: Update the unauthenticated sign-in / welcome screen UI to render a literal, exact h1 heading string "Welcome to EOA" (with this casing) on the sign-in prompt screen, ensuring no leading/trailing or garbled characters are introduced. Keep existing layout responsiveness and do not alter any login/logout logic (only the displayed welcome copy).
